message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is still a great deal for you, as you'll be getting the product for significantly less than its true value to you. Let's work together to make this happen.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at this price?
